bug.author: Ankur-singh
bug.description:
Describe the bug When you try to load a model after training, you get an UnsupportedOperations error. What is the current behavior? When try to load the model, it gives an error. If the current behavior is a bug, please provide the steps to reproduce.
Create a model Train the model and save it Try loading the model again
Expected behavior It should load the model without any error. Screenshots Other relevant information: poetry version: python version: Operating System: Additional tools: Additional context

comments.comment:
Hello this has already been pointed here <denchmark-link:https://github.com/dreamquark-ai/tabnet/issues/163>#163</denchmark-link>
It has been solved already in develop branch, you have 3 options:
switch to develop switch to python 3.7 wait for next release
Feel free to reopen and give more information if you think that this is not related.
Thanks <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Optimox>@Optimox</denchmark-link> . I will give it a try.
